hints.content:
We can think of $\purpleC{224}$ as $\purpleC{2\text{ hundreds}}$, $\purpleC{2\text{ tens}}$, and $\purpleC{4 \text{ ones}}$.  

We can think of $\blueD{791}$ as $\blueD{7\text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{9\text{ tens}}$, and $\blueD{1\text{ one}}$.

$\phantom{=}\purpleC{224}+\blueD{791}$

$=\purpleC{2\text{ hundreds}}+\purpleC{2\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{4\text{ ones}}+\blueD{7\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{9\text{ tens}}+\blueD{1\text{ one}}$

$= \purpleC{2\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{7\text{ hundreds}}+\purpleC{2\text{ tens}}+\blueD{9\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{4\text{ ones}}+\blueD{1\text{ one}}$
The answer: $2\text{ hundreds} + 7\text{ hundreds} + 2 \text{ tens}+9\text{ tens} +4 \text{ ones}+1 \text{ one}$

choices.content: $\small 2\text{ ones} + 7\text{ ones} + 2 \text{ tens}+9\text{ tens} +4 \text{ hundreds}+1 \text{ hundreds}$
$\small 2\text{ hundreds} + 7\text{ hundreds} + 2 \text{ tens}+9\text{ tens} +4 \text{ ones}+1 \text{ one}$
$\small 2\text{ hundreds} + 2\text{ hundreds} + 4 \text{ tens}+7\text{ tens} +9 \text{ ones}+1 \text{ one}$
